name: Atalanta
description: A nimble Marksman who knows how to inflict AoE damage at medium and short-range distances.

ultimate.name: Wild Sniper
ultimate.description: Atalanta selects a tile and dashes there, shooting a powerful penetrative bolt in the target direction, dealing 280% damage to all enemies along a 1-tile wide path and stunning them for 2s.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases damage to 300%.

When Atalanta hits an enemy with this skill, it triggers the explosion effect of Scorching Gift at the target's location, dealing 75% of the skill's damage. Scorching Gift can only deal damage 3 times to each enemy in this way each time she casts her Ultimate.
Increases damage to 320%.
Increases damage to 340%.

skill_1.name: Sweet Encounter
skill_1.description: Atalanta swings her whip at an enemy, dealing 130% damage, knocking them back 2 tiles, and immobilizing them for 3s. If there is another enemy behind the target within range, Atalanta will instead knock the target towards that enemy, dealing damage and immobilizing both of them.

upgrades.upgrade: If Atalanta knocks the target into another enemy, the two enemies take damage from each other. The damage received is equal to 150% of the other side's ATK, up to 300% of Atalanta's ATK.
Increases damage to 140%.
Increases damage to 150%.

skill_2.name: Scorching Gift
skill_2.description: Atalanta shoots an explosive bolt that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing 190% damage to the target and adjacent enemies.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases damage to 200%.
The explosion range is increased to 2 tiles. However, enemies in the outermost circle of the explosion only take 60% of the original damage.
Increases damage to 210%.

hero_focus.name: Hero Focus
hero_focus.description: Atalanta increases her Haste by 12 during battle. She gains an extra 2 Haste after dealing damage to 3 different enemies within 3s.

upgrades.upgrade: Atalanta increases her Haste by 15 during battle. She gains an extra 4 Haste after dealing damage to 3 different enemies within 3s.
Atalanta increases her Haste by 18 during battle. She gains an extra 6 Haste after dealing damage to 3 different enemies within 3s.

ex_skill.name: Sleight of Hand
ex_skill.description:
Sweet Encounter can be cast 2 times in a row when a battle statrts, prioritizing different targets.

Passive, the damage dealt by Sweet Encounter is increased by 6%.

upgrades.upgrade: The bonus damage ratio of Sweet Encounter is increased to 8%.

Atalanta steals 10% ATK and 10% Phys DEF from the target every time she hits her main target with Sweet Encounter. This effect cannot be stacked on the same target, and the stolen stats will be returned in 8s.
The bonus damage ratio of Sweet Encounter is increased to 10%.

enhance_force.name: Enhance Force
enhance_force.description: Atalanta recovers 10% of max HP every time an enemy is directly hit by Wild Sniper.

season_skill.name: Elusive Mirage
season_skill.description: After 5, 25, and 40 seconds into a battle, summons an untargetable illusion that casts the non-Ultimate skills in sequence, each with only 85% of the original Attack.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases ATK to 90% of its original value.
Increases ATK to 95% of its original value.
Increases ATK to 100% of its original value.
Increases ATK to 105% of its original value.
Increases ATK to 110% of its original value.
Increases ATK to 115% of its original value.
Increases ATK to 120% of its original value.
